H0.text: who proposed that electrons behave like waves and particles. Louis de Broglie

H1.text: who proposed that electrons behave like waves and particles. Niels Bohr

H2.text: who proposed that electrons behave like waves and particles. Erwin Schrödinger

H3.text: who proposed that electrons behave like waves and particles. Einstein

A4.text: Louis de Broglie postulated the wave nature of electrons in his 1924 Ph.D. thesis.

A5.text: The de Broglie hypothesis is an example of wave–particle duality.
